alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Claiborne, northwestern Grainger and eastern Union Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of New Tazewell, or 12 miles north of Maynardville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maynardville, Rutledge, New Tazewell, Plainview, Blaine, Luttrell, Springdale, Joppa, Rose Hill and Sharps Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
